name: Chronicles of Elloth - Adventure - The Catacombs of Framinster
name_original: Chronicles of Elloth - Adventure - The Catacombs of Framinster
description:
The Catacombs of Framinster

Lord Beowick of the Beowick Company, dedicated to the rescue and safekeeping of curios and magical artefacts, needs brave adventurers to embark on an adventure to retrieve a most important object from the catacombs beneath the city of Framinster, capital of the northern kingdom of Rithelm.

The spies of the Confederacy of High Lords will do anything to get their hands on this wondrous object in order to tip the balance of power to their side and overthrow the Hammer Alliance.

But horror and darkness await them in the depths. Yrhan, the Warlock is conjuring the power of the underworld.

_________________________

The Catacombs of Framinster' is a 46-page adventure within the Chronicles of Elloth, set in the northern city of Framinster, which is located in the realm of Rithelm, in the Elloth campaign world and setting. This adventure can be played in the setting provided or easily used in any setting or world.

In addition, 'The Catacombs of Framinster' provides a ready-to-play adventure regardless of the game system used, as it can be played with any RPG system.

_________________________

PRODUCT SHEET

TYPE: Adventure

RULING: Any epic/medieval fantasy role-playing game system

PAGES: 46 Pages

LANGUAGE: English

FORMAT: PDF Printable in both colour and black and white.
